task:
Task:
  The response arranges items into categories or an order using a specified or inferred scheme.
constraints: Completeness ("max"): The response is as exhaustive as reasonable, covering essentially everything relevant and treating omissions as errors.

Scope ("struct"): The response focuses on how things are arranged or related—dependencies, coordination, constraints, incentives, or organizing patterns—independent of sequence, value judgment, or viewpoint.

hydrated_constraints.description: The response is as exhaustive as reasonable, covering essentially everything relevant and treating omissions as errors.
